holidays.title: National Barbie Day
holidays.description: We all have thought of being a "Barbie Girl In A Barbie World."

holidays.title: Amerigo Vespucci Day
holidays.description: Let’s toast to the eternal peace of the great Italian mariner from the Age of Discovery!

holidays.title: Bang Clang Day
holidays.description: Find out more about the historic civil war battle that put wooden ships out of business.

holidays.title: International School Meals Day
holidays.description: Join over 30 countries to promote healthy eating for children in school and at home today.

holidays.title: Joe Franklin Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the life of Joe Franklin, the ‘King of Entertainment’ and the pioneer of talk shows.

holidays.title: March Full Moon
holidays.description: Get ready to see the magic of the full moon materialize before your eyes.

holidays.title: Nametag Day
holidays.description: Get ready to introduce yourself to the world by donning a name tag!

holidays.title: National American Paddlefish Day
holidays.description: National American Paddlefish Day is an effort to save the existing paddlefish population.

holidays.title: National Crab Meat Day
holidays.description: Grab your forks and dig into the most delicious crab meat while learning about the day.

holidays.title: National Dish Washer Appreciation Day
holidays.description: The dishwasher that we use today was the brainchild of a rich woman.

holidays.title: National False Teeth Day
holidays.description: Let's show our teeth the love and care they deserve this False Teeth Day!

holidays.title: National Get Over It Day
holidays.description: Let’s get over what’s weighing us down, and leave the past in the past.

holidays.title: National Heroes and Benefactors Day
holidays.description: National Heroes and Benefactors Day celebrates the contribution of Baron Bliss and other benefactors.

holidays.title: National Lina Day
holidays.description: You stand for what is right, Lina, so you deserve to have a special day!

holidays.title: National Marcia Day
holidays.description: With a name like this, you’re certainly worth celebrating on National Marcia Day!

holidays.title: National Meatball Day
holidays.description: Meatballs are a gift from the heavens and every culture seems to have their own version!

holidays.title: National Shane Day
holidays.description: Let’s enjoy this day and celebrate Shane’s contributions to the world on National Shane Day!

holidays.title: Popcorn Lover's Day
holidays.description: Prepare your bowls and taste buds, and let's start popping those kernels!

holidays.title: World Kidney Day
holidays.description: Let's start taking better care of our kidneys right now before it’s too late!

holidays.title: Bow Wow’s Birthday
holidays.description: He burst into the scene as a kid and shot to stardom very fast!

holidays.title: India Royale’s Birthday
holidays.description: Exclusive rundown through India Royale’s personal and professional life celebrating her birthday month!

holidays.title: Matthew Gray Gubler’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this actor, fame doesn’t move him as much as his love for all things art.

holidays.title: Somi’s Birthday
holidays.description: Join us for a deep dive into Somi’s success story as we celebrate her birthday today.

holidays.title: Suga’s Birthday
holidays.description: Your exclusive invitation — a trip down Suga’s memory lane to celebrate his 29 successful years.
